Actions.Name: Horrific Screech
Actions.Description: The [name] gains the following interrupt until the start of its next turn.

Interrupts.Name: Screech
Interrupts.Trigger: A foe in range 6 of the [name] rolls a save, and the result is determined.
Interrupts.Effects: The triggering foe, re-rolls their save with +1 curse, taking the new result as final. If they fail the save, they also become vulnerable.
